Because of a triple accident, a five-kilometer traffic jam is from Garik to Kirov on Berdskoye Shosse

02 Nov 2019, 16:19

Because of a triple accident, a five-kilometer traffic jam is from Garik to Kirov on Berdskoye Shosse
16:19 11/02/2019 Photo: Courier. Wednesday. Berdsk0
On November 2, near the village of Kirov, on the Berdskoye Shosse, at about 3 p.m. three cars collided with a train. The accident occurred on the strip towards Berdsk.


On a lousy hill towards Berdsk - traffic jam due to accident

On November 2, near the village of Kirov, on the Berdskoye Shosse, at about 3 p.m. three cars collided with a train. The accident occurred on the strip towards Berdsk. Due to the collision, a traffic jam formed - about 5 km. From the cafe "At Garik" to the village of Kirov, cars arrive in half an hour. Faced cars cost a little at a stop. Waiting for the emergency commissioner. If you have a need to go towards Berdsk - it is better to wait a bit.

 triple accident
